rows.label: qst104203_msg0001
rows.name:
It's time for Rex-sensei's
teaching debut!

rows.label: qst104203_msg0002
rows.name:
This may be just a practice lesson
for the kids, but it's also a chance
to see how much Rex has grown.

rows.label: qst104203_msg0003
rows.name:
I still remember when he was just a
babe... Perhaps I should have called
Correl over to see this, too.
